author: Tyler Clifford
title: Jim Cramer reveals second-quarter playbook, says the quarter is 'going to be so ugly'
description: The "Mad Money" host said investors should "stick with the staples, the utilities and the stay-at-home tech stocks.
content:
CNBC's Jim Cramer on Tuesday laid out his playbook for the next three-month period and broke down his predictions of what could be the best performing parts of the market next quarter.
"Just like the first quarter, I'm betting the second quarter will be bad … [+3051 chars]
